function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Thermal denaturation of proteins and nucleic acids as mechanisms of virus inactivation","Impact":"Reduced stability and potential for virus survival at higher temperatures","Mitigation":"Control temperature and humidity levels to minimize the risk of virus survival","Technologies":"Temperature and humidity control systems","People":"Occupants of built environments, healthcare workers, and general public","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities, and facility operators"},{"Description":"Effect of humidity on survival of viruses","Impact":"Variability in virus survival based on humidity levels, creating challenges for virus control","Mitigation":"Implement humidity control measures and monitoring systems","Technologies":"Humidity control systems","People":"Occupants of built environments, healthcare workers, and general public","Owner":"Building managers, public health authorities, and facility operators"},{"Description":"Disparities in results due to differences in suspension media for virus studies","Impact":"Unreliable data on virus survival and control due to varying experimental conditions","Mitigation":"Standardize suspension media and experimental conditions for virus studies","Technologies":"Standardized laboratory equipment and protocols","People":"Research scientists and laboratory technicians","Owner":"Research institutions and funding organizations"}]}
